member.name: FILE_BASIC_INFO
member.summary: Contains the basic information for a file. Used for file handles.

member.name: FILE_BASIC_INFO.CreationTime
member.summary: The time the file was created in format, which is a 64-bit value representing the number of 100-nanosecond intervals since January 1, 1601 (UTC).

member.name: FILE_BASIC_INFO.LastAccessTime
member.summary: The time the file was last accessed in format.

member.name: FILE_BASIC_INFO.LastWriteTime
member.summary: The time the file was last written to in format.

member.name: FILE_BASIC_INFO.ChangeTime
member.summary: The time the file was changed in format.

member.name: FILE_BASIC_INFO.FileAttributes
member.summary: The file attributes. For a list of attributes, seeFile Attribute Constants. If this is set to 0 in a FILE_BASIC_INFO structure passed to then none of the attributes are changed.
